segments.text: Because ... I heard John got married yesterday .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Oh , you went to the wedding ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , he didn't tell me about it . Don't feel bad .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I'm OK . I promise . Maybe you don't know that I have done with him for a long time .
segments.speaker: S2
